attributes.action: intervene to prevent the proposed development of the Jolly Boatman and  Hampton Court Station sites, and to take steps have the Jolly Boatman site acquired in the national interest to protect key views of Hampton Court Palace.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The petition concerns controversial proposal for a hotel and housing development on the Jolly Boatman and Hampton Court Station sites on the river Thames immediately opposite Hampton Court Palace.  

The proposal is widely opposed and has been described by the historian David Starkey as "an international scandal".  A campaign group - the Hampton Court Rescue Campaign - has been established to oppose the proposals.

We would like the government to have the development called in and decided at a public inquiry, with the most sensitive part of the site - the Jolly Boatman - acquired in the national     interest using Lottery and other funds.
